Posts.Content: I put a stone on during chemo and would love to lose it before my hols. Is it ok to go back to the gym. I finished herceptin last week and have had chemo and radiotherepy . An also on tamoxifen. Am 37 yrs old. Am feelin good and would really like to get back into fitness. I used to do kettlebells but I don't think that's advisable as I had my nodes take out. Any advise.
Posts.Title: Joining gym after Breast cancer.

Posts.Content: I am based in Ireland and tac is very common here. It's what I had. They didn't tell me it was any tougher but was recommended lots of water.
Posts.Title: Top tips for TAC treatment?
